DOC.brief_summary: This study compare blood vessel hormone difference woman history pregnancy complicate preeclampsia high blood pressure , woman history uncomplicated pregnancy last 10 year . The investigator hypothesize postpartum woman history preeclampsia alter blood vessel function abnormal hormone level compare postpartum woman history uncomplicated pregnancy . This study take place course 2 week . Each subject assess fix low-salt diet fix high-salt diet . Subjects 2 non-invasive blood vessel image test fast blood draw .
DOC.brief_title: Preeclampsia : A Marker Future Cardiovascular Risk Women
DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy female premenopausal volunteer , regular menstrual cycle ( least 8 cycle per year ) 2 . Age 21 50 year 3 . Systolic blood pressure < 140 > 90 mmHg diastolic blood pressure < 90 > 60 mmHg screen visit 4 . Body mass index < 35 kg/m2 5 . History normotensive pregnancy history preeclamptic hypertensive pregnancy within last 10 year 6 . No clinically significant abnormality screen test ( complete blood count , serum electrolyte , liver enzymes , thyroid stimulate hormone , urinalysis , electrocardiogram ) 1 . Current pregnancy 2 . Lactation 3 . Elevated blood pressure ( systolic blood pressure > 140 mmHg diastolic blood pressure > 90 mmHg ) 4 . Current diagnosis hypertension 5 . Current diagnosis diabetes mellitus 6 . Personal history coronary disease , stroke kidney disease 7 . Use prescription medication ( exception stable thyroid hormone replacement dose ) within 2 week study 8 . Use oral contraceptive hormone therapy within 3 month study ; 9 . Renal impairment ( estimate GFR < 60 ) 10 . Active liver disease ( AST , ALT , alkaline phosphatase > 1.5 time normal ) ; 11 . Current smoking , define smoking within 6 month screen visit 12 . Current past recreational drug use
